system.description:
Characters raised in a militant culture share a variety of traits in common with one another.

Dueling Challenge. You can issue a challenge of single combat to a single creature you can see who can hear and understand you. If that creature accepts your challenge, you enter a duel with them. When engaged in a duel, you gain an expertise die on your attack rolls. If any other creature attacks your foe, or assists you in any manner, you no longer gain that expertise die.

Military Traditions. You are proficient in History, and gain a specialization in military history. You are also proficient with light armor, simple weapons, starship weapons, one martial weapon of your choice, and your choice of land, air, or space vehicles.

Languages. You can read, sign, speak and write Common and one other language.
